subNodes.conversationText: "I am the beta fox, and I'm only here for testing purposes. If you want to play the game normally, end the conversation."
I want to vary my experience. (variable shifting)
Which variable would you like to test?
Sing me a song, Beta Fox.
"I'd like to try the encounter I'm working on.
"I am the beta fox, and I'm only here for testing purposes. If you want to play the game normally, end the conversation."
Greedy, greedy. What do you want?
These walls contain the world's knowledge
I want to visit a place or get experience.
I want to visit even more place
